casebody.data:
The State ex rel. Bailey, Appellee, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio, Appellant.

[Cite as State ex rel. Bailey v. Indus. Comm. (1998), 82 Ohio St.3d 174.]

(No. 95-2091 Submitted May 12, 1998 Decided June 17, 1998.) Betty D. Montgomery, Attorney General, and William J. McDonald, Assistant Attorney General, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
